scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:ConfigureTheme_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$context.RenderConfigurationForm($core_v2_widget.UniqueId('configuration')) #set($paletteTypes = false) #set($paletteTypes = $context.GetPaletteTypes()) #if ($paletteTypes && $paletteTypes.Count > 0)

$core_v2_language.GetResource('palettetypes-instructions')

    #foreach($paletteType in $paletteTypes)
    • #end
#end #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.configureTheme') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="ConfigureTheme_Description">Edit options for the current theme.</resource> <resource name="ConfigureTheme_Name">Theme Options</resource> <resource name="contains-staged-changes">Note: These options are currently staged.</resource> <resource name="file-delete">Delete this file (it is not incuded in the original version of this theme).</resource> <resource name="file-restore-original">Restore this deleted file.</resource> <resource name="file-revert-to-original">Revert to the original version of this file.</resource> <resource name="files">Theme Files</resource> <resource name="instructions">Set options to configure the behavior and content of all pages rendered by the theme.</resource> <resource name="no-revert-options">There are no theme options to revert.</resource> <resource name="open-preview">Open preview window</resource> <resource name="palette_inherit">(Inherit)</resource> <resource name="palettetypes-instructions">Select default palettes to be used when a specific option is not selected within widgets. Palette definitions can be changed by editing this theme.</resource> <resource name="paletteTypes-tab">Palettes</resource> <resource name="preview">Preview Drafts</resource> <resource name="preview-enabled">Previewing is now enabled. All browsers/devices you are signed into will now show staged changes.</resource> <resource name="properties">Theme Options</resource> <resource name="property_description">Defined in '{0}'</resource> <resource name="reset">Undo all unsaved changes</resource> <resource name="reset-description">All changes that have not yet been saved in this edit session will be reverted.</resource> <resource name="reset-successful">Unsaved changes have been reverted.</resource> <resource name="revert">Revert</resource> <resource name="revert-and-preview">Preview Reversion</resource> <resource name="revert-and-publish">Revert and Publish</resource> <resource name="revert-confirmation">Are you sure you want to revert the selected theme options?</resource> <resource name="revert-options">Reversion Options</resource> <resource name="revert-options-instructions">Select the options you'd like to revert from the list below.</resource> <resource name="revert-success">The selected theme options have been reverted successfully.</resource> <resource name="revert-success-reload">The selected theme options have been reverted successfully.
